meanings.sent1: The Connors family had a big reunion last weekend.
meanings.sent3: Why did the Connors family all have the same last name?
meanings.sent4: The Connors surname echoed through the generations.
meanings.sent5: The name Connors was proudly displayed on the family crest.

meanings.sent1: There are three Connors in my class.
meanings.sent2: The Connors played soccer together every weekend.
meanings.sent3: The Connors were like a pack of wolves on the field.
meanings.sent4: The Connors stood out in a sea of single Connors.
meanings.sent5: The group of Connors was a force to be reckoned with.
